**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion invOf_mul_self := by rw [‚Üê Algebra.commutes, ‚Üê Algebra.smul_def, ‚Üê map_smul, Algebra.smul_def, ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion mul_invOf_self := by rw [‚Üê Algebra.smul_def, ‚Üê map_smul, Algebra.smul_def, mul_invOf_self, hf] ```
Here `f` can be implicit, but as you prefer.
I prefer it explicit, since `f` doesn't appear in the goal and might take some work to construct. I suppose the new `f :=` syntax makes it not matter so much.
